class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.inspire.EnvironmentalMonitoringFacility
class.comment: Table to store the FeatureOfInterest information. Mapping file: mapping/feature/inspire/EnvironmentalMonitoringFacility.hbm.xml

column.name: featureOfInterestId
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: featureOfInterestTypeId
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the featureOfInterestType table. Describes the type of the featureOfInterest. Contains "featureOfInterestType".featureOfInterestTypeId

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the featureOfInterest, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Optional but unique

column.name: codespace
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the featureOfInterest, gml:name. Optional

column.name: codespaceName
column.comment: The name of the featureOfInterest, gml:name. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the featureOfInterest, gml:description. Optional

column.name: geom
column.comment: The geometry of the featureOfInterest (composed of the “latitude” and “longitude”) . Optional

column.name: descriptionXml
column.comment: XML description of the feature, used when transactional profile is supported . Optional

column.name: url
column.comment: Reference URL to the feature if it is stored in another service, e.g. WFS. Optional but unique

set.name: childs
set.comment: Relation table to store feature hierarchies. E.g. define a parent in a query and all childs are also contained in the response. Mapping file: mapping/transactional/TFeatureOfInterest.hbm.xml

column.name: parentFeatureId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related parent featureOfInterest. Contains "featureOfInterest".featureOfInterestid

column.name: childFeatureId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related child featureOfInterest. Contains "featureOfInterest".featureOfInterestid

column.name: mobile
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this feature is mobile or not
